title: Sasar - Novel Updates
author: Syaihan Syafiq
description:
Saiful and Sha are friends. Saiful is a final year student who is struggling in finishing his thesis and can’t wait to graduate. Sha on the other hand isn’t able to finish her studies in the university because of her following her whims in the past.

Both of them had lost someone, another friend named Adam. The trio now a duo. A traffic accident took the life of Adam, affecting the friendship between Saiful and Sha.

However, their acquaintances are killed one by one by a yellow-coated individual wearing a fedora hat, and Saiful and Sha start feeling that Adam’s death has something to do with it.>
